column4: hi, i installed ubuntu 11.04 on my dell notebook. after running apt-get upgrade and reboot, it freezes few seconds after boot (didn't ask me for hdd passphrase). where should be problem? thanks.
if you hold shift at boot, does the old kernel boot ok?
it seems that yes. i can see kernel dmesg (when i select recovery mode), without problems. but after that, the screen whill shutdown and .. thaths all
